content: These threads alway wind up the same Bush did it Pelosi did it Clintons fault and a partisan divide. Out of curiosity partisan BS aside How many Think we should pursue the search for truth or just foret it and move on. Honestly and non Partisan. Question: How many feel in thier heart considering America first, That we should Just forget the last eight years and start fresh? Move on. Choices: Should we Start fresh and forget the last eight years? Should we investigate the entire eight years and end the speculation?

content: I do. But how can we do it? For example, Obama ran on a platform that promised two things. Change and hope. Well, here we have the House Speaker good ole Nancy Pelosi saying at first that she had no knowledge of water boarding and now she is saying she was misled by our CIA. Everybody but her husband and Jack Flats knows she is lying and our President is just doing nothing as usual. Why doesn't he step up and ask her to step down? How can we pursue truth, move on and be non-Partisan when we continue to have BS leaders representing us?
